sentences.sentence: He was praised for his enthusiasm and his open-mindedness.
sentences.translation: 他由于为人热情、思想开明受到了赞扬。

sentences.sentence: Visual cues can help prevent absent-mindedness.
sentences.translation: 视觉提示有助于防止走神。

sentences.sentence: Visual cues can help prevent absent mindedness.
sentences.translation: 视觉线索可以帮助防止心不在焉。
